conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D criteria met.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of wall thickness, height, and isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is highly faithful. Minor wall alignment drift on the right wing but overall layout is correct.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture mapping; kitchen, dining and bedrooms correlate well with the 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; lighting is soft and aids depth perception.

detected_errors.description: Minor door/window placement shift on the far right perimeter wall.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D conversion that maintains high geometric integrity and interior furniture placement accuracy.
